title: Dont buff adc damage again...
body:
We already dealt with ADCs right-clicking you to death in 3 hits for like 4 seasons, why do we need this back? Just lower everyone's damage ffs. How is it supposed to be fun dying in 1 second to everything even as bruisers and tanks?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: Well I wouldn't mind it too much if they actually gave the enchanters some of their power back.  (We already have tissue paper towers once the shields fall.)

ADC IS A ROLE THAT BUILDS FULL DAMAGE WITH NO DEFENSES AND IT GETS ONESHOTTED EVEN BY SUPPORT IN 1V1--------"I DON'T WANT TO DIE IN 3 HITS"

OK dude, tell me then why its fine when aatrox ,ahri ,akali ,annie ,azir ,sol ,brand ,camille ,diana ,ekko .evelynn , fiora , fizz ,gragas , hecarim ,irelia , jax ,kassadin ,katarina , kayn , kennen ,le blanc , lee sin , yi , nidalee , nocturne , pantheon , pyke , renekton , rengar , riven , shaco , syndra , taliyah , talon , trynd, veigar, wukong , yasuo , zed and,finally, zoe....... can LITERALLY oneshot you in less then 3 seconds, and i'm being generous, they are completely INDEPENDENT from their team and can shine without A SUPPORT babysitting them + THEIR KIT/BUILD ISN'T FULL DAMAGE.

Now tell me thats fair, ah no, you are already telling me that a character full damage shouldn't do damage 'couse you are tired of it.

You know what I'm tired of? of a game where 4 people in the botlane, are less important than 1 toplaner/midlaner/jungler.
the only reason 4 people in botlane exist is to feed other lanes.
Supports aren't supports anymore PYKE OMGLOL, brand LOOOOOOOOOOL velkoz haahahahah at least they can have some impact on the game

Don't revert crit? give them lifesteal on every item for free :D ranged only btw so yasuo can stop being a concern. so you can still oneshot them, but only if u have enough damage.

Or revert crit, so they can oneshot people AS ALMOST EVERY CHAMP IN THE GAME is already doing.

And don't come up with the melee argument, 'couse nowadays all champions fly like micheal jordan, so stop faking to be all udyr, only udyr is udyr.
